name: Hulu Adventure
description:
Fly and Survive. A new adventure game for everyone.

Hulu is a flying bird from the good side world of wonderland.

One day Hulu practice flying...
but he can't really fly because it was his first time flying outside his home.      
When he felt tired, Hulu sat down and looked around. He saw his surrounding and
realized that he is missing their place. Hulu now wants to go home.
                     
Help Hulu fly and find his mother in the mysterious world of wonderland

___________________

New Adventure Game with simple control

Press spacebar to avoid obstacle
